text: Music is really something that makes people whole.
author: Kareem Abdul-Jabbar

text: I think the world is ready for some rock 'n' roll. Some real time guys that play their own instruments, write their own songs, and sing the music and have a good time doing it.
author: Vince Neil

text: People are going deaf because music is played louder and louder, but because they're going deaf, it has to be played louder still.
author: Milan Kundera

text: Do I listen to pop music because I'm miserable or am I miserable because listen to pop music?
author: John Cusack

text: For me, music and life are all about style.
author: Miles Davis
